TopicTitle: Kerbal Rocket Science - Experiment 01 - Terminal Velocity

Articles.Content:
[h=1]Welcome fellow rocket scientists to my new series, we find out how the Kerbal universe works by the only way I know how, experimenting on Kerbals HA HA HA (Evil laugh)...

So you want to know how the universe works, well just go and find out and conduct experiments, the answers may be on the web but there's no better satisfaction than getting your own answers.

Today we find out about terminal velocity on Kerbin.

If you have any ideas for further experiments let me know and I may try them out, now go do science the Kerbal way.

[/h]
